categories: Category:Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2012 articles

nodes.text: Inside Artoo! is an interview of Kenny Baker conducted by James Burns and published in Star Wars Insider 111. Baker discusses all aspects of his work inside R2-D2 during the filming of the Star Wars movies, discussing how he was cast, his experiences on set, and relationships with the other cast members, as well as a few brief questions on his involvement in other movies, his health, and his work as Paploo. This article was later reprinted in Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2012.
